entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -33.6°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
